name: Fruits Pop Star
description:
Stop squeezing and start popping!
Tap and pop 2 or more fruits. Enjoy sweet time in Fruits Pop Star with 160 completely new challenging levels!

Why you will like FRUITS POP STAR
- 160 new and amazing juicy levels
- 3 terrific maps: Pitaya Loch, Peach Garden, Lemon Shoal
- Interesting obstacles and collect items (Cake, Bread, Chocolate etc.)
- An astonishing arsenal of boosters and props
- Sweet and cute fruits
- Easy to play, challenging to fully master
- Completely FREE to play

How to Play
- Tap 2 or more same adjacent fruits to collect
- Gather various fruits to win sweet levels before you run out of moves
Note: The more fruits collected each time, the more stars you will receive.

Stay tuned for forthcoming incredible new levels in Fruits Pop Star!
